about_the_game:
This DLC unlocks the entire functionality of Scribble It!

  • All word packages from our amazing community can be used in private lobbies,
  • All event game modes can be played in private lobbies with your friends.
  • Unlocks 30 new avatars.
  • Unlocks 5 new theme colors.
detailed_description:
This DLC unlocks the entire functionality of Scribble It!

  • All word packages from our amazing community can be used in private lobbies,
  • All event game modes can be played in private lobbies with your friends.
  • Unlocks 30 new avatars.
  • Unlocks 5 new theme colors.
legal_notice: Scribble It!® is a registered trademark of Detach Entertainment UG (haftungsbeschränkt). © Detach Entertainment UG (haftungsbeschränkt) 2019-2024 all rights reserved. linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04.6 LTS
  • Processor: Intel® Dual-Core 2.4 GHz / AMD® Athlon 64 X2 Dual-Core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ 600 Series / AMD® Radeon HD 7000 Series / Intel® HD Graphics 5000 with 512MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan compatible graphics card is required.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04.3 LTS or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core i3-2100 (3.1 GHz) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ 600 Series / AMD® Radeon 200 Series with 1024MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan compatible graphics card is required.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Big Sur 11
  • Processor: Intel® Dual-Core 2.4 GHz / AMD® Athlon 64 X2 Dual-Core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Metal compatible graphics card is required. The game may not run on Apple Sillicon.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Ventura 13 or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core i3-2100 (3.1 GHz) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Metal compatible graphics card is required. The game may not run on Apple Sillicon.

name: Scribble It! - Premium Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Dual-Core 2.4 GHz / AMD® Athlon 64 X2 Dual-Core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ 400 Series / AMD® Radeon HD 7000 Series / Intel® HD Graphics 4000 with 512MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core i3-2100 (3.1 GHz) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ 600 Series / AMD® Radeon 200 Series with 1024MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: This DLC unlocks the entire functionality of Scribble It!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Swedish, Vietnamese, Ukrainian, Hindi, Slovak, Korean, Czech
